attributes.action: ask parliament to put pre-nuptial law recognising prenuptials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like parliament to put in to law pre-nuptials with independent advice for both parties, disclosure of wealth of both parties , recognise foreign agreements that meet the same above rules.

This should give both uk and overseas people a good way to protect themselves and end the pointless court cases in courts that will carry on due to pre-nuptials not being recongnised in uk.

Also any prenuptials being deliberately  changed under duress or threats of murder.
